DataElement.preferredName: Patient Compliance Removable  Retainer Device Component First Integer 6 Month Assessment Percentage Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The percentages of patients who are compliant with the amount of time they are instructed to wear their removable retainer in the first six months after they receive the retainer.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Compliance Removable  Retainer Device Component First Integer 6 Month Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The patients who are compliant with the amount of time they are instructed to wear their removable retainer in the first six months after they receive the retainer.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Patient Compliance is the extent to which the patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations.

Concepts.definition: The extent to which a patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations.

Property.preferredName: Removable Retainer Device Component First Integer::6 Month Assessment
Property.preferredDefinition: Capable of being taken away.:A physical device designed to hold something in place.:Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::6:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: A physical device designed to hold something in place.
Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed that is a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 10/23/18 jk chg reg status to Standard as part of RECIST FG content; reused by 30 CDEs and multiple SOs. 10-19-2018 TMT received permission from BC to transfer ownership from NIDCR to NCI Standards.

ReferenceDocuments.name: What percentage of your patie
ReferenceDocuments.description: What percentage of your patients in retention do you estimate to comply with your clinical recommendation of amount and frequency of REMOVABLE retainer wear within the first 6 months post-treatment
